info.title: ParaWave PTT API
info.description: API for managing PTT channels and real-time audio transmissions for paragliding pilots

get.description: Retrieve a list of channels with optional filtering by type, location, and active status. Requires read permission.

post.description: Creates a new PTT channel. Requires write permission. Emergency channels require admin permission.

description.example: Canal local pour le site de parapente de Val d'Isère

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific channel. Requires read permission. Admin users get additional statistics.

put.description: Updates an existing channel. Requires write permission.

delete.description: Deletes a channel (soft delete by default). Requires admin permission. Use ?hard=true for permanent deletion.

post.description: Creates a new channel with a manually specified UUID. UUID must be unique.

400.description: Invalid request or UUID already exists

get.description: Returns the health status of the PTT API service and its dependencies.

post.description: Join a PTT channel as participant. Requires access permission for the specific channel (access:{uuid}).
Leave a PTT channel. Requires access permission for the specific channel (access:{uuid}).

delete.description: Leave a PTT channel using DELETE method. Requires access permission for the specific channel (access:{uuid}).

get.description: Retrieve list of current participants in a channel. Requires access permission for the specific channel (access:{uuid}).

put.description: Update the ephemeral APNs PTT push token for a channel participant. This token is provided by the iOS Push-to-Talk framework after joining a channel.

ephemeral_push_token.description: Ephemeral APNs PTT token from iOS framework

400.description: Bad request (missing token, not a participant, etc.)

post.description: Initiate a new PTT audio transmission in a channel. Maximum transmission duration is 30 seconds.

value.error: Valid audio_format is required (aac-lc, opus, pcm)

403.description: Channel access denied or already transmitting

post.description: Send a chunk of audio data for an active transmission. Chunks must be sent in sequential order.

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: The transmission session ID returned from start transmission

post.description: End an active PTT transmission and get transmission statistics.

404.description: Session not found or already ended

get.description: Get information about the currently active transmission in a channel, if any.

parameters.name: channel_uuid
parameters.description: The channel UUID to check for active transmissions

get.description: Upgrade HTTP connection to WebSocket for real-time PTT audio transmission. Used for receiving live audio broadcasts.

parameters.name: channel_uuid
parameters.description: The channel UUID for real-time PTT communication

join_time.description: When the user joined the channel

is_transmitting.description: Whether the user is currently transmitting

Ephemeral APNs PTT token from iOS framework for push notifications
